story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_0200_10:
Hey, Paulo, Tina. Where are you off to in such
a hurry?
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_0300_10: Blue? What are you doing here?
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_0400_10:
I thought you had your hands full with
Team Rocket...
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_0500_10:
Haha! Team Rocket? We already took care of
those losers!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_0600_10: Guess we didn’t need your help after all!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_0800_10: We’re having a party to celebrate! Wanna join?
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_1000_10:
Actually, we were looking for Professor Oak...
Is he already at the party?
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_1200_10:
Yeah, he’s there, having fun, even though he’s an
old geezer.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_1800_10:
I’m guessing you came to take out
[Name:PlayerNickname ], since [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he’s" F="she’s" ] a thorn
in your side?
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_1900_10: Bah! So you figured it out.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_2000_10: You’re right! Well done seeing through me!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_2100_10: I suppose this little ruse was a failure.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_2200_10:
Trickery was a waste of time. You should’ve just
taken them down by force.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_2300_10:
I dunno...it was kinda fun, playing a champion
of justice!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_2400_10: Ugh! Even the pretty-boy executive showed up!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_2500_10:
Well...now that you’ve seen through our disguises,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_2600_10:
I guess we’re gonna have to do this the hard way!
Too bad for you!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_2800_10:
Oh? And what do you expect to do without
Hoopa’s power?
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_2900_10:
Why don’t you just hide behind
[Name:PlayerNickname ] like the little weakling
you are?
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_3300_10:
Wait...aren’t you two the leaders of Team Aqua
and Team Magma?!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_3400_10:
Hate to break it to ya, but our only goal right now
is to protect Pasio.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_3500_10:
Shocked, are you? Then we have further news
you’ll like even more.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_3600_10:
We’re not the only ones. Other organizations are
also joining the battle all over Pasio!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_3700_10:
You’ve become the common enemy—one that
transcends ideals and beliefs.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_3900_10:
It started as an alliance to stop Team Break from
getting too out of hand.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_4200_10: Avenging ourselves on you isn’t on our agenda.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_4300_10: After all, we’re not so different from you.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_4400_10:
We had strong beliefs that once led us down the
wrong path.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_4500_10:
We couldn’t just stand by and watch you repeat
our mistakes.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_4600_10:
We’ve got more life experience than you, kiddo,
so we were gonna show you just how wrong you
were, but...
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_4700_10:
Lookin’ at your face now, I can tell you don’t need
that anymore.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_4900_10:
That’s all we’ve got to say. Don’t you kids have
something to take care of?
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_5000_10:
You’ve got a world to save—one where people
and Pokémon can live together in happiness!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_5300_10:
You aren’t the only ones who possess the power
of Legendary Pokémon. Are you sure you still want
to do this?
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_5400_10:
Yeah, I hope you don’t end up regretting making
an enemy out of Team Rocket!
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_5500_10:
You heard the man, Archie. Please don’t make an
embarrassment of yourself.
story_final_02_01000/2401_1201_5700_10: Don’t go messin’ things up on my watch, Maxie!
